scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on the model's predictions without direct access to the underlying dataset.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy and robustness of the customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A customer churn prediction model deployed for a large retail banking institution predicts the likelihood of a customer closing their accounts. The model is accessed via a publicly available API, but underlying data is considered highly sensitive and protected under GDPR.
